channel.title: Homes on Ercan Özkaya
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Ercan Özkaya

item.description: I am a software engineer based in Istanbul, Turkey. My main focus is crafting products with a robust architecture that provide a natural user experience. I am passionate about free software and have worked on various open source projects throughout my career. Most notable is the Joomla project where I took the role of release manager and also participated in the Google Summer of Code program. Right now I work as a consultant for Timble where I lead the Joomlatools brand and build things for the web.
